thread.title: Ukraine to Receive UAV Defense Artillery by the End of the Year - RayHaber
thread.title_full: Ukraine to Receive UAV Defense Artillery by the End of the Year - RayHaber

title: Ukraine to Receive UAV Defense Artillery by the End of the Year - RayHaber
text:
German arms manufacturer Rheinmetall, to Ukraine Skyranger short-range air defense systems The company's CEO, Armin Papperger, stated that the contract will be signed at the DSEI defense fair in England. Although no official agreement has been announced yet, Papperger stated that the contract hundreds of millions of dollars he said it would be worth it.
About the Skyranger System
Skyranger can be mounted on various vehicle platforms, even older tanks. is a short-range air defense tower.With its 35 millimeter gun, it has approximately 16 square kilometers (6 square miles) can scan an area effectively. Especially against low-flying targets such as drones The system, which is highly effective in combating threats, has the capacity to clear an area of approximately 4x4 kilometers from unmanned aerial vehicles with each unit.
Germany and Rheinmetall Support Ukraine
Since the Russian invasion of Ukraine began, Germany has been one of Europe's most important supporters. Rheinmetall, headquartered in Düsseldorf, has “The most important defense industry partner of Ukraine in the fight against Russian aggression” The company has previously supplied Ukraine with main battle tanks, armored combat vehicles, ammunition, and Gepard and Skynex air defense systems. This new Skyranger delivery aims to further strengthen Ukraine's air defense capabilities.
